name: Top Car SpeedFast Racing
description:
Top Car SpeedFast Racing, drifting in 3D HD graphic, take your amazing speed fast car with super driving skills, push them miles beyond their limits to create new heights.
Take control of luxury licensed cars in real asphalt road. Only racing for speed to racers, fire up your car and be the first to cross the finish line!
Features:
.Real car racing game in google
.Racer need for speed only
.Drift car with fast speed
.Control left or right to avoid coming car
.HD graphics
.Excited background
